alert.note: Alert for Sherburne; Stearns; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 17 at 10:07AM CDT until May 20 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Mississippi River at St. Cloud affecting Sherburne, Stearns and Wright Counties. .Recent rainfall has resulted in significant rises on area rivers. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at St. Cloud. * WHEN...Until Friday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 845 AM CDT Tuesday, the stage was 9.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 845 AM CDT Tuesday was 9.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Friday morning and continue falling to 8.3 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.4 feet on 05/17/1999. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
